BIO

As of March 28, 2020

A young, ambitious and determined student of life, I am excited to take on new learning opportunities and skills! With a vision in front of me and experience behind me, I am always improving, learning and moving forward. My primary skills are in web development and in software development. I know markup and programming languages such as HTML, CSS, Javascript and C#. I work very closely with clients and partners to develop and deploy websites and applications of extraordinary quality and to exact specifications described by the client. I'm passionate about development, computers, aviation and self-development. I spend a lot of time reading books on how I can improve myself, become more productive and more polite, friendly and extroverted. At the moment, I run one business (TrillionComputers - A computer repair company) and I offer my development skills to those looking for websites or better ways to express and materialize their business or niche idea in the world of the Internet.
